projects.title: BullFighting 3D: Survival
projects.tech: Unreal Engine, C++, Blender, Python, Android Studio, Java

projects.title: Simple Play Billing
projects.description: A code plugin for Unreal Engine to integrate Google Play Billing library in Unreal projects via blueprint nodes.
projects.tech: Unreal Engine, C++, Android Studio, Java

projects.title: Google Play Utils
projects.description: A code plugin for Unreal Engine that exposes the 'unique id', 'nickname', and 'auth token' of the user from the user's Google Play account to blueprints and C++.

projects.title: Android Vita Companion
projects.description: Send various commands to your PS Vita over the network using TCP. A useful utility for a PS Vita with broken (or constantly pressed) 'Power and PS Home button'.

projects.title: Arduino Led Memory Game </br> (Firmware)
projects.description: Arduino Led Memory Game is a basic memory game built for Arduino made with the intention of helping newbies to get started with microcontrollers and serial communication over USB and Bluetooth Low Energy.

projects.title: Arduino Led Memory Game </br> (Android App)
projects.description: This is the Android app for Arduino Led Memory Game.

projects.title: Easy Serial Com </br> (Library)
projects.description: Easy Serial Com is a library for Arduino made to quickly get started with serial communication, and without getting the main code dirty by a bunch of incoming data parsing algorithms.

projects.title: Fill-A-Doc
projects.description: Fill-A-Doc is an open-source project created to eliminate the scarcity of a simple lightweight tool to fill in PDF fields. It was created mainly for the purpose of typing text into simple PDF form templates.

projects.title: DSO Reporting and Tracker </br> (Mobile App)
projects.description: An app for a local distributorship business (Xpertek Distributors) to track and manage DSO's (Distribution System Operators). Features - Track Location, Maintain Attendance, Collect Sales Data, Import/Export Sales Data to Excel and Tally.

projects.title: DSO Reporting and Tracker </br> (Web App)
projects.description: An app for a local distributorship business (Xpertek Distributors) to track and manage DSO's (Distribution System Operators). Features - Track Location, Maintain Attendance, Collect Sales Data, Import/Export Sales Data to Excel and Tally.

projects.title: DSO Reporting and Tracker </br> (Server)
projects.description: An app for a local distributorship business (Xpertek Distributors) to track and manage DSO's (Distribution System Operators). Features - Track Location, Maintain Attendance, Collect Sales Data, Import/Export Sales Data to Excel and Tally.

projects.title: Cluck n' Cut
projects.description: Be a butcher ! A chicken cutting game for Android.

projects.title: eLokr </br> (Mobile And Web App)

projects.title: Blender Stairs </br> (Ported for Blender 2.79)
projects.description: Adds a new mesh object to Blender for quickly creating staircases. Useful for blocking in scenes - or just quickly making a flight of basic stairs without having to fiddle with the Array modifier. The original Blender stairs addon was made for Blender 2.8+ which uses Python 3.7; this addon has been ported for Blender 2.79 which uses Python 3.5. This is just a port and not original work.

projects.title: Zelda Navi's Quest for PS Vita </br> (Support 8-axis movement)
projects.description: Originally a Zelda fan game ported for PS Vita. Modified in this fork to allow 8-axis movement.
